name: Granny: Evil House Horror
description:
If you want to have a scary time, play Evil Barbi Granny : Horror game 2019 now and try to escape from the horror house

Evil Barbi Granny : Horror game 2019 is the latest version of Barbi Granny game with new features, beautiful graphics and scary sound

You need find the escape way from the Barbi Granny house to survive, you will have to use all the tools you find at your hand to complete the puzzle and unlock doors finding the key hidden somewhere in structure that will help you get out of here.

Be quiet and careful because the Barbi Granny Nun hears everything. She set traps by herself for her unexpected guests. You have only 5 days to get out of her house.

Key Features :
- Fearful and tension atmosphere
- Smooth and easy controls
- Horror sound
- 3D graphics
- The best horror game 2019

When you encounter Barbi Granny, fear will make you die, run fast to find a way to escape and get out of this horror house fast.

Remember, you only have 5 days, Good Luck....
